==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|せい|こう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/seikau/}} → {{IPAchar|/seikɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/seːkoː/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=せいこう}} compound {{m|zh|性交|tr=sjeng<sup>H</sup> kæw|lit=sex + cross}}. Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} ''sin-kâu'' or {{etyl|yue|-}} ''sing<sup>3</sup> gaau<sup>1</sup>''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|せいこう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|せいこう|hhira=せいかう}}

# [[sexual intercourse]], [[sex]], [[coitus]], [[copulation]]

====Usage notes====
This term is more formal and clinical than the everyday term {{ja-r|セックス}}.

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|せいこう|hhira=せいかう}}

# to [[have sex]], to [[copulate]]

====Usage notes====
This term is more formal and clinical than the everyday term {{ja-r|セックス}}.
